summary: This mod like any other Shouting mod just simply edits Shout\'s recharge time, to be more like real dragon recharge time.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]Go to video tab to see preview ![/size]
This mod like any other Shouting mod just simply edits Shout\'s recharge time, to be more like real dragon recharge time.


*It\'s recommended to use with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5626]ThuuMic v1[/url], for better immersion.

It was done using SkyEdit tool.

There should be no bugs, mod will not be working with any other mod that changes shouts recharge time, so you have to load it as you last plugin.

[size=4]NOTE !!
If you get your last shout looking wierd (Two rectangles) then it\'s not my fault, this shout is doubled by the game, and I really cant find that bugged value in Shouts tab.[/size]
author: barbieass

files.name: RDSRT 1dot2 FINAL
files.changelogHtml:
Gives you real dragon power needed to use ThuuMic
Reduces recharge time by 2-3 times as 1.1
